description:
Outline planning permission for the erection of a five storey building to provide 41 residential units. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  1-13 PO1B - PO3B
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun on or before whichever is the later of the following dates:- 1) 5 years from the date of this permission; 2) 2 years from the final approval of details reserved by this outline permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 92(2) of the Town and Planning Act 1990.
